hero.heading: Give Sadaqah & Change Lives
hero.subheading: Every act of charity, no matter how small, has the power to transform lives and communities around the world. Your generosity creates lasting impact.
hero.hadith: The Prophet ﷺ said: 'Sadaqah extinguishes sin as water extinguishes fire.'
hero.popularSubtitle: Choose from our most impactful options

sectionHeadings.chooseTypeDesc: Select how you would like to contribute and make a difference in the lives of those in need.
sectionHeadings.immediateDesc: These individuals and families need your immediate support. Your Sadaqah can help relieve their suffering and provide essential assistance.
sectionHeadings.periodicDesc: Set up regular donations to provide consistent support and maximize your rewards. Choose the schedule that works best for you.

faq.question: What is Sadaqah?
faq.answer: Sadaqah is voluntary charitable giving in Islam, encouraged at all times to help those in need and earn spiritual rewards.

faq.question: Is my donation tax-deductible?
faq.answer: Yes, all donations are tax-deductible. You will receive a receipt for your contribution that can be used for tax purposes.

faq.question: Can I make recurring donations?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We offer several recurring donation options to make it easy to give consistently and maximize your rewards.

cta.hadith: The believer's shade on the Day of Resurrection will be his charity.
cta.text: Your Sadaqah creates a chain of goodness that extends far beyond what you can imagine. Every donation, no matter how small, contributes to lasting change in communities around the world.
